function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"http://app-cdn.jjwxc.net/bookstore/getFullPage?channelBody=%7B%"+url+"%22%3A%7B%22offset%22%3A%22<,{{(page-1)*25}}>%22%2C%22limit%22%3A%2225%22%7D%7D&versionCode=148":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="bq"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=221&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq='+url+'&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=3&sd=0&lx=0&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}\}':u;
 u=tag=="lx"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=221&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=3&sd=0&lx='+url+'&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}}':u
 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

ruleContent.content:
if(baseUrl.match(/jjwxc/)){ var javaImport = new JavaImporter(); javaImport.importPackage( Packages.java.lang, Packages.javax.crypto.spec, Packages.javax.crypto, Packages.java.util ); with(javaImport){ let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b"); let ALGORITHM = "DES"; let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding"; let CHARSET = "utf-8"; let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN"); function decode(data){ let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes()); let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES"); let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks); let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM); let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET)); cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv); return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET); } } //DES解密结束 intro=java.get("intro"); intro=intro!=""?"◎"+intro+"◎
":""; content=java.getElement("$.content"); saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n作者有话说：\n"+saybody:""; if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){ result=intro+String(decode(content)+say); }else{result=intro+content+say} flag_comment=source.getVariable() //获取评论开启 if(!baseUrl.match(/baidu/)){ if(flag_comment==1){ //匹配书籍id跟章节id bid=baseUrl.match(/novelId=(\d+)/)[1]; cid=baseUrl.match(/chapterId=(\d+)/)[1]; //拼接评论url url="https://s8-static.jjwxc.net/comment_json.php?novelid="+bid+"&chapterid="+cid; //获取评论列表 list=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).body; comment=""; //判断评论数量 len=list.length>15?15:list.length; for(i=0;i ##为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*|获取正文失败[\s\S]+

$=result;

/*if(title.match(/[一二三四五六七八九十百千万\d]+\s*章|^\d+[、\.\s]|chapter\s*\d+/i)){
num=''
}else{num=num}*/
title=type?'📖 '+title+' 📖':title;
v=vip?' ◇':'';l=lock?'[此章节已锁]':'';
result=num+title+l+v;
</js>

<js>
var time = Math.round(new Date()/1000);
lll=[
"appId=",
"time="+time,
"osType=2",
"product=1",
"sysVer=10",
"ver=2.1.7",
"packageName=com.lestory.jihua.an",
"lang-app=zh-Hans",
"lang=zh-hans",
"locale=CN"
]
function toJson(list){
    json = "";
    for (i in list)
    {
        all = list[i].match(/(.*?)=(.*)/);
        key = all[1];
        value = all[2];
        json += '"' + key + '":' + '"' + value + '",'
    }
    json = '{' + String(json).replace(/,$/,'')+ '}'
    return json;
}
function sign(list){
var sb='';
sb+="Fb0gqLMSf5Android";
list=list.sort();
i=0;
while(i<list.length){
if(i==0){
sb+=list[i]
}else{
    if(list[i].match(/lang-app=/)){  
      i2=i+1;
     i3=i2+1;
     if (list[i2] != null && list[i2].match(/lang=/)) {
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i2];
                        
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i];
                        
                        i = i3;
                    }
           }
                sb+="&";
                sb+=list[i];             
      }
i++
}
sb+="AEdDtho2CjiH901aVK7swFqclu6NmzJ4";
return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase()
}

if(!baseUrl.match(/welfare\/award/)){

java.put('token',baseUrl.match(/token=(.*)/)[1]);

list=[{"name":"书币余额","book_id":baseUrl.match(/(\d+)/)[1]}];
result=JSON.stringify(list)
}else{

page=java.get('page');
cat=baseUrl.match(/cat=(\d+)/)[1];
finished=baseUrl.match(/finished=(\d+)/)[1];
li=lll;
li.push("finished="+finished);
li.push("cat="+cat);
li.push("page_num="+page);
sign=sign(li);
li.push("sign="+sign);
j=toJson(li);

option={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(j)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/book/category-index,'+JSON.stringify(option);
java.ajax(url)}}else{
l=[];
var token=baseUrl.match(/token=(.*)/)[1];
li=lll;
li.push("read_time=44800");
li.push("token="+token);

li.push("sign="+s);

}
for(i=1;i<=15;i++){

l.push(String(java.ajax(url)));
}
result=JSON.stringify(l);}

searchUrl:
<js>
/*调试->右上角的小虫子，随便搜一个词*/
/*Token写了东西的话要删掉才能进行下面步骤：
①填上电话号码点调试会获取验证码；
②填上验证码点调试会获取token；
③把token填在Token【目录的章节url那也有个token记得也要填，不填的话从发现点的书是没有登录的】；
④把电话号码跟验证码的值删了【❗️填了电话号码会一搜索就发验证码】，保存书源*/
/*如登录过期需要重新登录，请删除以前填写的token再调试获取验证码，重复前面的步骤*/

电话号码="";

验证码="";

Token="34304776fc02d974a641eef13b603e20";

//下面不要动
var time = Math.round(new Date()/1000);
token=java.put('token',Token);
lll=[
"appId=",
"osType=2",
"product=1",
"sysVer=10",
"time="+time,
"token="+token,
"ver=2.1.7",
"packageName=com.lestory.jihua.an",
"lang-app=zh-Hans",
"lang=zh-hans",
"locale=CN"
]
function toJson(list){
    json = "";
    for (i in list)
    {
        all = list[i].match(/(.*?)=(.*)/);
        key = all[1];
        value = all[2];
        json += '"' + key + '":' + '"' + value + '",'
    }
    json = '{' + String(json).replace(/,$/,'')+ '}'
    return json;
}

function sign(list){
var sb='';
sb+="Fb0gqLMSf5Android";
list=list.sort();
i=0;
while(i<list.length){
if(i==0){
sb+=list[i]
}else{
    if(list[i].match(/lang-app=/)){  
      i2=i+1;
     i3=i2+1;
     if (list[i2] != null && list[i2].match(/lang=/)) {
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i2];
                        
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i];
                        
                        i = i3;
                    }
           }
                sb+="&";
                sb+=list[i];             
      }
i++
}
sb+="AEdDtho2CjiH901aVK7swFqclu6NmzJ4";
return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase()
}



//获取验证码开始
num=电话号码;
y=验证码;
if(num.match(/^\d{11}$/) && !y  && !Token){
list2=lll;
list2.push( "mobile=86"+num);
s=sign(list2);
list2.push("sign="+s);
json2=toJson(list2);
option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(json2)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/message/send,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
java.log(JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).msg=="success"?"验证码发送成功，请注意短信":"验证码获取失败，请稍候再试");
}else if(y && !Token){
list2=lll;
list2.push("mobile=86"+num);
list2.push("code="+y);
s=sign(list2);
list2.push("sign="+s);
json2=toJson(list2)

option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(json2)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/user/mobile-login,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
a=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));
java.log(a.msg=="success"?'❗️下面是你的Token，请复制❗️\n'+a.data.user_token:JSON.stringify(a));
}
//获取验证码结束

li=lll;
li.push("page_num="+page);
li.push("keyword="+key);
s1=sign(li);
li.push("sign="+s1);
j=toJson(li);
option={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(j)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/book/search,'+JSON.stringify(option)
</js>

bookSourceComment:
1.正文乱码或空需登录刷新正文，登录建议随便点进一本书的正文后再点勾
2.建议关闭预下载
3.网站限制频繁访问

<js>

href='';text='';

href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}
java.put('list',href);

result='换源列表（点击设置书籍变量，输入序号，确认后刷新，可更改对应的源，默认为0）\n'+text+'\n'+laiyuan+'\n--------------\n'+intro
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
if(result.match(/請勿瀏覽及購買本館商品，本網站已依照台灣網站內容分級規定處理。/)){
url="https://www.popo.tw{{@@id.books-form@action}}";

value=result.match(/name="_poporf-tk001" value="([^"]+)">/)[1];

Cookie=String(cookie.getCookie(baseUrl));
body='cid=&type=&_poporf-tk001='+value;

cookies=java.post(url,body,{"cookie":Cookie}).cookies();

Cookies=String(cookies).match(/\{(.*?)\}/)[1]+'; '+Cookie;

header={"Cookie":String(Cookies)}
headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}
java.put('header',JSON.stringify(headers));
Url=baseUrl+','+JSON.stringify(headers);

result=String(java.ajax(Url))

}else{result=result}
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/50);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];
if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*50)))
}
list
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var n;
if
((result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/))!=null){

var list=[];
for(var i=1;i<=n;i++){
list.push({k:'第'+i+'页',v:baseUrl.replace(/page=\d+/g,'page='+i)});
}
}else{
var list=[{k:'第1页',v:baseUrl}];
}
list
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>

doc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); chapter=doc.select(".chapter")?doc.select(".chapter"):''; chapter?chapter.remove():''; content = { star: 0, childNode: [], childNodes: doc.select("#content>div").toArray(), load: function() { var a = String(java.base64Decode(java.getString('//*[@name="client"]/@content'))).split(/[A-Z]+%/); var j = 0; for (var i = 0; i < a.length; i++) { if (a[i] < 3) { this.childNode[a[i]] = this.childNodes[i + this.star]; j++ } else { this.childNode[a[i] - j] = this.childNodes[i + this.star]; j=j+2 } }; } } content.load(); result=chapter+content.childNode.join("
"); String(result).replace(/([^<]+)<\/h3>/g,'◎ $1\n'); ####【注：$1】

<js>
//DES加密开始
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util  
);
with(javaImport){
function encryptByDES(massage, keydata) {
        let cipher = Cipher.getInstance("DES");
        let keySpec = new DESKeySpec(String(keydata).getBytes());
         let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
         let key = keyFactory.generateSecret(keySpec);      
        cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE, key);
        return Base64.encodeToString(cipher.doFinal(String(massage).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP)
}
}
//DES加密结束

var deskey = 'web@hzlq';
var userId='0';
function getPostUrl(data,type) {
var url = 'http://m.ndlib.cn/nlc_read_home/service.do,';
var md5Key = 'library_2016@hzlq';
value = {
    siteId: 1,
    data:String(encryptByDES(JSON.stringify(data), deskey)),
    userId: userId,
    fromSource: 3,
    osType: 5,
    version: "1.0.1",
    versionCode: 10001,
    timeStamp: data.timeStamp,
    hashCode: String(java.md5Encode(data.timeStamp + md5Key))
}
var option={
"method":"POST",
"body":'cmd='+type+'&value=' + encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(value))
}
return url + JSON.stringify(option);
}
var data ={
    timeStamp:Date.now(),
    bigType:"0",
    pageSize:100,
    pageNum:parseInt(java.get('page'))
};

if(baseUrl.match(/categoryId/)){
data.categoryId=baseUrl.match(/categoryId=(\d+)/)[1];
url=getPostUrl(data,'qryCategoryResList')
}else{
data.content=String(java.get('key'));
url=getPostUrl(data,'qrySearchList')
}

java.ajax(url)
</js>

bookSourceComment:
只看楼主
◎编辑书籍详情页，在简介内容填上 【只看楼主】  保存，刷新书籍页（有已缓存的正文记得正文也要刷新）
◎内容只有楼主发帖，无作者名时间等
去空行
◎层与层之间有一行空行，不想要空行的话
◎就在书籍详情页的简介内容填上【去空行】
◎只看楼主跟去空行随便怎么写，写对字就行
发现规则url
贴吧名::https://tieba.baidu.com/mo/q/m?word=贴吧名（不要写吧字）&page_from_search=index&tn6=bdISP&tn4=bdKSW&tn7=bdPSB&lm=16842752&lp=6093&sub4=%E8%BF%9B%E5%90%A7&pn={{(page-1)*30}}

if(title.match(/\.doc|\.xls|\.pdf/)){ h=java.getString("@@class.doc-content@html"); if(h==""){ data=result.match(/pureViewPageData = (\{[\s\S]+?\}) \|\|/)[1]; json=JSON.parse(data); list=json.readerInfo2019.htmlUrls.json; png=json.readerInfo2019.htmlUrls.png; h=""; for(i in list){ html=java.ajax(list[i].pageLoadUrl); $=html.match(/wenku_\d+\(([\s\S]+)\)/)[1]; $=JSON.parse($); list2=$.body; for(j in list2){ if(String(list2[j].c).match(/^\s{1,5}$/)){ c="
" }else{ c=list2[j].c } if(list2[j].t=="pic"){ c='' } h+=c } h+="
" }} result=h }else{ if(result.match(/class="txt/)){ org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result).select(".txt").html()} else{ md5=result.match(/"md5sum":"([^"]+)"/)[1]; token=result.match(/"downloadToken":"([^"]+)"/)[1]; imglist=eval(result.match(/"bcsParam":(\[[\s\S]+?\])/)[1]); html=''; for(i in imglist){ url='https://wkretype.bdimg.com/retype/zoom/'+token+'?pn='+parseInt(imglist[i].page)+'&x=0&y=0&raww=1080&rawh=810&o=jpg_6&type=pic&aimh=810'+md5+imglist[i].zoom; html+='\n' } result=html } } ##‚(.*?)‛##“$1”
